name: get_synonyms
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool dicolink.
Tool description: Dicolink API lets you retrieve information about French words, including definitions, synonyms, antonyms, quotes, expressions, lexical field, scrabble score, and much more...
API description: Fetches synonyms of a specific word using the Dicolink API.

mot.description: The word for which to fetch synonyms.

limite.description: The maximum number of synonyms to return. Defaults to '10'.
